title: 609 - Costume Nostalgia?
description:
Kissed by a nuclear pillow and give the power to lull you off to dreamland, Scooter meanders through the K-mart aisles and middle school dances in his mind. (story at 19:45)

Thanks to all the listeners who give “value for value” by becoming patrons on Patreon @ http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com/patron

Commission a Song from Jonathan Mann @ song.jonathanmann.net
